description: State and RocksDB are only available if METRICS_RECORDING_LEVEL is with value DEBUG

targets.expr: avg(kafka_streams_stream_metrics_poll_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_metrics_process_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_metrics_commit_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app",region="$region"}) or avg(kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_poll_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_process_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_commit_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app",region="$region"})

kafka_streams_stream_metrics_poll_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"} or kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_poll_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", thread_id=~"$thread_id", region="$region"}

kafka_streams_stream_metrics_process_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"} or kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_process_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name",thread_id=~"$thread_id",region="$region"}

kafka_streams_stream_metrics_commit_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"} or kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_commit_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name",thread_id=~"$thread_id",region="$region"}

avg(kafka_streams_stream_metrics_poll_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_metrics_process_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_metrics_commit_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"}) or avg(kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_poll_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", thread_id=~"$thread_id",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_process_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", thread_id=~"$thread_id",region="$region"})+avg(kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_commit_latency_avg{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", thread_id=~"$thread_id",region="$region"})

kafka_streams_stream_metrics_task_created_rate{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name", client_id=~"$client_id",region="$region"} or kafka_streams_stream_thread_metrics_task_created_rate{cluster_name="$cluster", app="$app", node_name=~"$node_name",thread_id=~"$thread_id",region="$region"}
